response.original_title: Sleep Paralysis and the Phenomenon of the Shadow People
response.overview: Millions of people suffer from the curious condition known as sleep paralysis. Not being able to move or speak after waking, many have also reported seeing otherworldly phenomena while in this state. Join us as we talk to three such people as they share with us the terror they live with on a nightly basis. Complete with stunning re-enactments, we shall attempt to shed light on this non-treatable and incurable condition.
response.title: Sleep Paralysis and the Phenomenon of the Shadow People
